_source.text: 7. Give you a weird nickname 8. Tell you what's on my shirt right now. 9. Ch-ch-ch-challenge you to post this on your journal (Challenge sounds much better than tag).

text: 7. Give you a weird **nickname** 8. Tell you what's on my shirt right now. 9. Ch-ch-ch-**challenge** you to post **this** on your journal (**Challenge** sounds much **better** **than** tag).
